protectedBranches.label: Protected branches
protectedBranches.helpText: The signature of every commit, that gets pushed onto these branches, is verified first. If this list is empty, then the signature gets verified for every branch.

verificationType.label: GPG verification
verificationType.helpText: Different types of allowed signatures. Either every signature gets allowed, only the signature of SCM-Manager users or the signatures belonging to a pre-defined list of gpg keys.

displayName.label: Display name
displayName.helpText: Display name of the gpg key

signatureCheck.description: May configure the signature check globally for every repository
May configure the signature check for a namespace or repository
